weka.distributed.hadoop

Class CorrelationMatrixHadoopJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • distributed.core.DistributedJob
      • weka.distributed.hadoop.HadoopJob
        • weka.distributed.hadoop.CorrelationMatrixHadoopJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, CommandlineRunnable, EnvironmentHandler, OptionHandler, ImageProducer, TextProducer

    public class CorrelationMatrixHadoopJob
extends HadoopJob
implements TextProducer, ImageProducer, CommandlineRunnable
    Hadoop job for constructing a correlation matrix. Has an option to use the matrix constructed for performing (a non-distributed) PCA analysis.
    Version:
    $Revision: 11847 $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
